Traits.Name: Leaping Predator
Traits.Content: The Jersey Devil can leap up to 30 feet as part of its movement without expending extra movement, allowing it to navigate through dense forests and terrain quickly.

Traits.Name: Terrifying Presence
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of the Jersey Devil must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Jersey Devil makes two attacks with Gore.

Actions.Name: Gore
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (5d10 + 7) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Terrifying Shriek
Actions.Content: The Jersey Devil unleashes a horrifying scream. Each creature within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, a creature also takes 12 (2d10) psychic damage.
